original_title: The Salt Ghost: Return of the Nitro Express
overview: A documentary about a historic Triumph motorcycle and it's builder running the bike at Bonneville Salt Flats and El Mirage during the 1960s and 1970s. It also tells the story of the two modern day owners discovering the bike, it's history and making some history of their own as they bring the bike back to life and back to attempting to break speed records.
title: The Salt Ghost: Return of the Nitro Express
